renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define Main void mainImage(out vec4 Q,in vec2 U){UNIFORMS
vec2 R; vec2 V; float T; int I;
#define UNIFORMS R=iResolution.xy;V=gl_FragCoord.xy;T=iTime;I=iFrame;
#define _s vec2(64,64)
#define A(U) texelFetch(iChannel0,ivec2(U),0)
#define B(U) texelFetch(iChannel1,ivec2(U),0)
#define C(U) texelFetch(iChannel2,ivec2(U),0)
#define D(U) texelFetch(iChannel3,ivec2(U),0)
#define number(n,u) smoothstep(.5,.45,.01*sin(2.*T)+B(clamp(u,vec2(0),_s)+vec2(n,12)*_s).w)
#define weight(n,u) (C(clamp(u,vec2(0),_s)+vec2(n,0)*_s).w)
#define active(x,y) A(vec2(x,y)+.5).w
renderpass.name: Common
Buffer A
Buffer B
